basics.name: T Tirabassi
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a Bachelors in Information & Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in the Spring of 2025, and hope to have a career in software engineering as well as game design and development.

education.institution: University of Massachusetts Boston, Boston, MA

highlights: Assist students and faculty with systems and services across all UH and CC locations
Collaboration with on campus tech-based departments

work.summary: Performed culturally choreographed shows for onboard guests
highlights: Entertain, teach, and interact with guests in regards to performances
Guide guests through hula lessons and produce welcoming environment

volunteer.summary: The world's largest educational and scientific computing society
Uh Manoa club that focuses on the development of student produced game projects.

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Awarded to students who earned a semester gpa of 3.5 on the basis of full time enrollment of 12 credits or more.

awards.title: Dean's Merit Scholarship
